name: io.github.Flux159/mcp-server-kubernetes
description: MCP server for interacting with Kubernetes clusters via kubectl

environment_variables.description: Comma delimited list of allowed tools.
environment_variables.name: ALLOWED_TOOLS

environment_variables.description: Set to false to disable automatic secrets masking in responses.
environment_variables.name: MASK_SECRETS

environment_variables.description: Specify kubeconfig as a yaml string.
environment_variables.name: KUBECONFIG_YAML

environment_variables.description: Specify kubeconfig as a json string.
environment_variables.name: KUBECONFIG_JSON

environment_variables.description: Specify kubeconfig file path. Defaults to ~/.kube/config
environment_variables.name: KUBECONFIG_PATH
